title: Hands on with GPT-4-powered Bing AI Chat's virtual search
description: Bing Chat continues to enrich its user experience by rolling out a new feature - Visual Search in Chat. This function combines the power of OpenAI's GPT-4 model with image search abilities to offer a more interactive way of browsing the web. [...]

title: Meta confirms WhatsApp is down worldwide
description: WhatsApp, the globally renowned messaging app, unexpectedly went offline today, leaving its vast user base unable to send or receive messages. [...]

title: Adobe emergency patch fixes new ColdFusion zero-day used in attacks
description: Adobe released an emergency ColdFusion security update that fixes critical vulnerabilities, including a fix for a new zero-day exploited in attacks. [...]

title: OpenAI credentials stolen by the thousands for sale on the dark web
description: Threat actors are showing an increased interest in generative artificial intelligence tools, with hundreds of thousands of OpenAI credentials for sale on the dark web and access to a malicious alternative for ChatGPT. [...]

title: Microsoft: Hackers turn Exchange servers into malware control centers
description: Microsoft and the Ukraine CERT warn of new attacks by the Russian state-sponsored Turla hacking group, targeting the defense industry and Microsoft Exchange servers with a new 'DeliveryCheck' malware backdoor. [...]

title: Microsoft expands access to cloud logging data for free after Exchange hacks
description: Microsoft is expanding access to additional cloud logging data for customers worldwide at no additional cost, allowing easier detection of breached networks and accounts. [...]

title: Facebook behavioral ads banned by Norwegian privacy watchdog
description: The Norwegian Data Protection Authority (DPA), the country's data privacy watchdog, has banned behavioral advertising on Meta's Facebook and Instagram social networks. [...]

title: Ukraine takes down massive bot farm, seizes 150,000 SIM cards
description: Cyber ​​Police Department of the National Police of Ukraine dismantled another massive bot farm linked to more than 100 individuals after searches at almost two dozen locations. [...]

title: US govt bans European spyware vendors Intellexa and Cytrox
description: The U.S. government has banned European commercial spyware manufacturers Intellexa and Cytrox, citing risks to U.S. national security and foreign policy interests. [...]

title: FBI: Tech support scams now use shipping companies to collect cash
description: FBI warns of a surge in tech support scams targeting the elderly across the United States and urging victims to dispatch cash concealed within magazines or similar items through shipping firms. [...]

title: U.S. preparing Cyber Trust Mark for more secure smart devices
description: A new cybersecurity certification and labeling program called U.S. Cyber Trust Mark is being shaped to help U.S. consumers choose connected devices that are more secure and resilient to hacker attacks. [...]
